segments.text: can you give me a hand with some things in the kitchen ? I don ’ t think I can finish everything in time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ok , what do you want me to do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: first of all , I need you to do the drying up . I ’ m almost finished the washing up . I ’ m going to clean the cooker when I finish .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ok . I ’ ll put the plates and cutlery away as I dry them . Where is the tea towel ? Oh , here it is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: we ’ ll have this finished in no time with two if us working on it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: while you ’ re cleaning the cooker , I ’ ll wipe the worktop . That was a great meat , by the way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: actually , it was just some leftovers from yesterday . I made far too much food to eat alone . I am glad you could come over to help me finish it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: my pleasure ! This tea towel ’ s a little ragged . Do you have another one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes . Look in that drawer . I should throw the old one out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: keep it and use it as rag . You can clean your bicycle with it .
segments.speaker: S2
